Ready to Transform Your Space?

At Maco Painting, we're dedicated to delivering exceptional results and superior service. Whether you're planning a residential repaint or a commercial project, we're here to help bring your vision to life.

Connect With Us

What to Expect When You Call

When you contact Maco Painting, we'll discuss your project needs and schedule a convenient time for a free on-site estimate. Our owner, Mario Cetroni, personally oversees projects to ensure the highest quality standards and customer satisfaction.

1

Initial Consultation

We'll discuss your project, timeline, and specific requirements.

2

Free Estimate

We provide detailed, transparent quotes with no hidden costs.

3

Project Planning

We'll develop a tailored plan that minimizes disruption to your home or business.
